column2: BRIEF-Global Cord Blood Q4 Earnings Per Share RMB 0.80 June 29 (Reuters) - Global Cord Blood Corp: * ORATION REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR OF FISCAL 2020 * ADDED 18,488 NEW SUBSCRIBERS IN 4Q20 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Global Cord Blood Corporation Provides Update on COVID-19 April 27 (Reuters) - Global Cord Blood Corp: * GLOBAL CORD BLOOD - ESTIMATES CO’S NEW SUBSCRIBER NUMBER IN 2021 WILL FALL TO 60,000-65,000, 19%-29% DECREASE FROM 2020 NEW SUBSCRIBER TARGET * GLOBAL CORD BLOOD CORP - CURRENT OPERATING DATA POINTS TO LOW END OF EXPECTED FISCAL 2021 NEW SUBSCRIBER RANGE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Global Cord Blood Says Quarterly Revenue Rose 31.7% March 11 (Reuters) - Global Cord Blood Corp: * ORATION REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE THIRD QUARTER AND FIRST NINE MONTHS OF FISCAL 2020 * Q3 REVENUE ROSE 31.7 PERCENT TO RMB 334.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Global Cord Blood Corp Provides Update On Impact Of Coronavirus Feb 14 (Reuters) - Global Cord Blood Corp: * GLOBAL CORD BLOOD CORPORATION PROVIDES UPDATE ON IMPACT OF CORONAVIRUS * GLOBAL CORD BLOOD CORP - ANTICIPATES A NEGATIVE IMPACT TO ITS FISCAL 2020 Q4 PERFORMANCE ENDING MARCH 31, 2020 * GLOBAL CORD BLOOD CORP - “WILL NOT RULE OUT POSSIBILITY OF ADJUSTING ITS SALES TARGET FOR CURRENT FISCAL YEAR OR ITS STRATEGY FOR COMING FISCAL YEAR” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
